sense.def:
To swap something with someone
pomeni dati nekaj nekomu in v zamenjavo od njega dobiti nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: He swapped a dozen goats for a female calf.

sense.def:
To swap one thing for another
pomeni odstraniti neko stvar in namesto nje uporabiti drugo.

seg.quote: I swapped my cap for a large black waterproof hat.

sense.def:
To swap stories or opinions with someone
pomeni, da si dve ali več oseb pripovedujejo zgodbe ali mnenja o čem.

seg.quote: They swap amusing stories about the place.
